name: Feedism Simulator
description:
A virtual reality game

Made for VR Jam!

The team!

Spottedphyre - Co-Designer, Artist/Modeler, Audio

Grinjr - Co-Designer, Programmer

In Feedism Simulator you must simply eat as much as you can, as quick as you can! Devour all the food in your path before the time expires! With each piece you grow, allowing you to reach new heights!

Go here to view the development thread on Twitter (mainly screenshots).

Currently in an extremely early stage, uploaded for feedback. Will be continually worked on as the jam goes on!
